actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for the travel expenses of a taxpayer's spouse who accompanies the taxpayer on business travel.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to delete provisions prohibiting the deduction of the travel expenses of a taxpayer's spouse who accompanies the taxpayer on a business trip.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for the travel expenses of a taxpayer's spouse who accompanies the taxpayer on business travel.
